content:
and i am reminded of a story from the soviet union  
i heard about a poet being arrested after a party  
his body being dragged in a car  
his friends, wailing on the curb  
and him shouting 'friends,  
do you not understand the beauty  
of being arrested for writing of love?'  
  
and i wonder  
what will happen when i am arrested  
will i scream, and struggle, to, in one line  
give meaning to someone else's survival  
or will i go into my own mind  
and sit there  
and sing
